alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 11:18AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1118 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Geneva, or near Melrose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Keystone Heights, Bostwick, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome and Putnam Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
